ref_item.label: Subjects 7-75 years of age
ref_item.description: Subjects who have been diagnosed with type 1 diabetes

pred_item.label: Study Phase - 100 mg/dL Target (Visits 5-11 or 12-18)
pred_item.description: Participants used the MiniMed AHCL system with both Auto Basal and Auto Correction enabled with a glucose target of 100 mg/dL for approximately 45 days. This could be the first or second half of the study phase depending on randomization.
interventionNames: DEVICE: MiniMed AHCL System - Auto Basal + Auto Correction (100 mg/dL)

ref_item.name: AHCL insulin pump system
ref_item.description: 670G 4.0 system with GS3; 780G system with G4S (continued access phase);

pred_item.name: MiniMed AHCL System - Auto Basal + Auto Correction (120 mg/dL)
pred_item.description: The MiniMed AHCL system with automated basal insulin delivery (Auto Basal) and automated bolus correction (Auto Correction) every 5 minutes, with glucose target set to 120 mg/dL. The system includes the MiniMed 670G insulin pump (version 4.0 algorithm) with CGM system and a meal detection module developed by DreaMed Diabetes.

ref_item.description: The overall mean difference of the change in HbA1c from baseline to end of 3-month Study Period.
ref_item.timeFrame: Baseline to End of 3-Month Study Period

pred_item.description: Change in hemoglobin A1C (%) from the end of the run-in period to the end of the study phase
pred_item.timeFrame: From end of run-in period (~14 days) to end of study phase (~90 days)

ref_item.description: The overall mean change in % of time in euglycemia (70-180 mg/dL) from baseline to end of 3-month Study Period will be estimated.
ref_item.timeFrame: Baseline to End of 3-Month Study Period

pred_item.measure: Change in mean time in range (TIR, 70–180 mg/dL)
pred_item.description: Percentage of time spent in target glucose range of 70–180 mg/dL from the end of the run-in period to the end of the study phase, measured by continuous glucose monitoring (CGM)
pred_item.timeFrame: From end of run-in period (~14 days) to end of study phase (~90 days)

ref_item.description: Number of severe hypoglycemic events occurred during 3-month Study Period

pred_item.measure: Change in time below range (TBR) at <50 mg/dL
pred_item.description: Percentage of time spent below glucose range at <50 mg/dL measured by CGM from the end of the run-in period to the end of the study phase
pred_item.timeFrame: From end of run-in period (~14 days) to end of study phase (~90 days)

ref_item.description: Number of Diabetic Ketoacidosis (DKA) event occurred during 3-month Study Period

pred_item.measure: Change in time above range (TAR) at >250 mg/dL
pred_item.description: Percentage of time spent above glucose range at >250 mg/dL measured by CGM from the end of the run-in period to the end of the study phase
pred_item.timeFrame: From end of run-in period (~14 days) to end of study phase (~90 days)

ref_item.measure: Change in Percent of Time in Hypoglycemic Range (<70 mg/dL)
ref_item.description: The overall mean change in % of time in hypoglycemic range (\<70 mg/dL) from baseline to end of 3-month Study Period will be estimated.
ref_item.timeFrame: Baseline to End of 3-Month Study Period

pred_item.measure: Change in time below range (TBR) at <70 mg/dL
pred_item.description: Percentage of time spent below glucose range at <70 mg/dL measured by CGM from the end of the run-in period to the end of the study phase
pred_item.timeFrame: From end of run-in period (~14 days) to end of study phase (~90 days)
